generated.css: *{margin:0;padding:0;border:none;outline:none;box-shadow:none;background:none;box-sizing:border-box}body{height:100vh;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center}.ad{width:505px;height:540px;overflow:hidden;background-color:#bed3ce;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;position:relative;color:#e74c3c;text-shadow:1px 1px 1px #000,1px 1px 1px #000;border:1px solid #000;--xMove:0;--yMove:0}.ad .parallax{transition:transform .7s}.ad:hover .parallax{transition:transform .1s linear}.ad .scene-1{width:100%;height:100%;position:absolute;left:0;top:0;background-color:#bed3ce;z-index:1;animation:hide-scene .5s 4s forwards}@keyframes hide-scene{to{opacity:0}}.ad .head{width:200px;position:absolute;left:140px;top:50px;transform:translateX(calc(2px*var(--xMove)*-1)) translateY(calc(3px*var(--yMove)*-1))}.ad .hand{width:180px;position:absolute;left:65px;top:270px;transform:translateX(calc(5px*var(--xMove)*-1)) translateY(calc(7px*var(--yMove)*-1))}.ad .hand-wrapper{transform:translateX(25px) translateY(50px) scale(.7);transform-origin:50% 300px;animation:tranlateHand .5s ease-out forwards}@keyframes tranlateHand{to{transform:none}}.ad .scene-1-description{width:100%;position:absolute;left:0;bottom:30px;text-align:center;font-size:30px;letter-spacing:1px;line-height:1.2}.ad .word-1{opacity:0;animation:show-word 5ms ease .7s forwards}.ad .word-2{opacity:0;animation:show-word 5ms ease 1.2s forwards}.ad .word-3{opacity:0;animation:show-word 5ms ease 1.7s forwards}.ad .word-4{opacity:0;animation:show-word 5ms ease 2.2s forwards}@keyframes show-word{to{opacity:1}}.ad .hooligan-wrapper,.ad .scene-2{width:100%;height:100%;position:absolute;left:0;top:0}.ad .hooligan-wrapper{transform:translateY(10px)}.ad .hooligan-1-wrapper{opacity:0;animation:show-hooligan 5ms ease 4.7s forwards}.ad .hooligan-1{width:280px;position:absolute;left:-15px;bottom:-12px;transform:translateX(calc(8px*var(--xMove)*-1)) translateY(calc(10px*var(--yMove)*-1))}.ad .hooligan-2{width:280px;position:absolute;left:12px;bottom:-20px;transform:translateX(calc(6px*var(--xMove)*-1)) translateY(calc(8px*var(--yMove)*-1))}.ad .hooligan-2-wrapper{opacity:0;animation:show-hooligan 5ms ease 5.3s forwards}.ad .hooligan-3{width:280px;position:absolute;left:-3px;bottom:80px;transform:translateX(calc(4px*var(--xMove)*-1)) translateY(calc(6px*var(--yMove)*-1))}.ad .hooligan-3-wrapper{opacity:0;animation:show-hooligan 5ms ease 5.9s forwards}.ad .hooligan-4{width:280px;position:absolute;left:30px;bottom:100px;transform:translateX(calc(2px*var(--xMove)*-1)) translateY(calc(2px*var(--yMove)*-1))}.ad .hooligan-4-wrapper{opacity:0;animation:show-hooligan 5ms ease 6.5s forwards}@keyframes show-hooligan{to{opacity:1;transform:none}}.ad .scene-2-description{position:absolute;right:25px;top:160px;text-align:right;text-transform:uppercase;font-weight:900;letter-spacing:2px;font-size:20px}.ad .scene-2-description .line-1{opacity:0;transform:translateY(10px);animation:show-line .05s ease 4.7s forwards}.ad .scene-2-description .line-2{opacity:0;transform:translateY(10px);animation:show-line .05s ease 5.3s forwards}.ad .scene-2-description .line-3{opacity:0;transform:translateY(10px);animation:show-line .05s ease 5.9s forwards}.ad .scene-2-description .line-4{opacity:0;transform:translateY(10px);animation:show-line .05s ease 6.5s forwards}.ad .scene-2-description .line-5{opacity:0;transform:translateY(10px);animation:show-line .05s ease 7.1s forwards}.ad .scene-2-description .line-6{opacity:0;transform:translateY(10px);animation:show-line .05s ease 7.7s forwards}@keyframes show-line{to{opacity:1;transform:none}}.ad .action-button{padding:12px 20px;position:absolute;right:30px;bottom:30px;background-color:#e74c3c;box-shadow:1.2px 1.2px 1px #000,1.2px 1.2px 1px #000;color:#fff;font-weight:800;line-height:1;cursor:pointer;pointer-events:auto;transform:scale(0);font-size:11px;text-shadow:none;z-index:1;text-decoration:none;animation:show-button .2s cubic-bezier(.255,.55,.54,1.645) 7.15s forwards}.ad .action-button:hover{box-shadow:2.2px 2.2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.5),2.2px 2.2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.5)}.ad .action-button:active{box-shadow:3.2px 3.2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.35),3.2px 3.2px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.35)}@keyframes show-button{to{opacity:1;transform:none}}
